author: Matthew McHone
comment: Great concept for an app that bypasses the need to use similar websites to view watch faces but the app is dead as it cannot load any data and should be removed from the Play Store since it's clearly been abandoned.

author: Patrick
comment: The show your watch section will not upload.  Please fix, been broken for months.
title: Broken

comment: Slow loading and frequent force close
title: Unstable

author: Sergio Rincon
comment: Was able to find many faces that are not available without searching for hours.  Thanks guys.
title: Great app.

comment: Won't show any faces when I select all faces.
title: Doesn't work

author: Brian Feckter
comment: Originally had 5 stars, now just force closes. Needs to be fixed

reply.author: FaceStore
reply.content: Thanks for support! We will keep updating new watch face for you :)

title: Not working

author: Larry Wilson
comment: Would like to see a Mackey Mouse face where his hands point to time.  Like in the 50'.
title: Samsung Gear Live Watch

author: _ Baldwin
comment: Best way to quickly search all watch faces and it learns your downloaded faces to suggest new ones you may like. Great job on the app developers. Its the best way to search but why is there not an "all" watch face search option to display all faces available in the Google play store? I've got a download tab, new faces tab and featured tab...but not an "all" tab??

reply.author: FaceStore
reply.content:
Yes, we don't have all list of watchface on the market
It is because watchface is not good enough to show to you or just we are not working hard to update watch faces.
We promise that we will do our best to list all watchfaces on the market. 
If you have specific watchface that want to put on list, please tell us directly. :)

title: Just what I was looking for!

author: Von Bryan
comment: Just black screen.. I am using nxs5 running ART.. If that would help

reply.author: FaceStore
reply.content: ART was the problem! We solved this problem. Please try again and tell me if it works!
